comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200411050810

I got the following error while debugging a runtime workbench.  The target had
just hit a breakpoint and was in the process of suspending.  I have been unable
to reproduce the error.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.debug.core 4 120 2004-11-07 13:26:40.968
!MESSAGE Exception processing debug async queue
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.debug.core 4 120 2004-11-07 13:26:40.968
!MESSAGE Exception processing debug async queue
!STACK 0
java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
        at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.HashMap$ValueIterator.next(Unknown Source)
        at java.util.AbstractCollection.toArray(Unknown Source)
        at
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.ui.monitors.ThreadMonitorManager$DetectDeadlock.run(ThreadMonitorManager.java:206)
        at org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugPlugin$AsynchJob.run(DebugPlugin.java:879)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 78534 ***
